title: Top Main LF ranked 5s / Duo (Bronze3 LF push to Silver+)
body:
TL;DR
Casual silver 2 a few seasons ago, just got back into LoL a couple months ago and want to push rankings once more.

Main champs: Renekton, fiora, gnar, irelia (my favoured picks) however i've got a huge champion pool that i am competant at playing well.
I do play any other roles, however ADC is by far the weakest one as i generally only play it as a last resort.

I am looking for a competant team or duo partner that has good knowledge of the game and current /future metas.

add my IGN: Doctor Jekyll if you're keen!

replies.body: yo im bronze 1 I main jg sometimes top if needed
